tool_description: Search or verify lists of email addresses in seconds
title: Tomba

api_list.name: DomainStatus
api_list.description: Returns domain status if is webmail or disposable.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://tomba.p.rapidapi.com/domain-status"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "tomba.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Enrichment
api_list.description: The Enrichment API lets you look up person and company data based on an email, For example, you could retrieve a person’s name, location and social handles from an email

api_list.name: DomainSearch
api_list.description: You can use this endpoint to show different browser icons to your users. The code argument receives the browser code as it appears in your user /account/sessions endpoint. Use width, height and quality arguments to change the output settings.

required_parameters.name: domain
required_parameters.description: Domain name from which you want to find the email addresses. For example, \\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\"stripe.com\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\\"

optional_parameters.name: department
optional_parameters.description: Get only email addresses for people working in the selected department(s).

optional_parameters.name: page
optional_parameters.description: Specifies the number of email addresses to skip. The default is 1.

organization.description: Stripe is a financial infrastructure platform for businesses. Millions of companies—from the world’s largest enterprises to the most ambitious startups—use Stripe to accept payments, grow their revenue, and accelerate new business opportunities. Headquartered in San Francisco and Dublin, the company aims to increase the GDP of the internet.

api_list.name: LinkedinFinder
api_list.description: This API endpoint generates or retrieves the most likely email address from a Linkedin URL.

required_parameters.name: url
required_parameters.description: The URL of the Linkedin. For example, "https://www.linkedin.com/in/alex-maccaw-ab592978".

api_list.name: EmailVerifier
api_list.description: verify the deliverability of an email address.

required_parameters.name: email
required_parameters.description: The email address you want to verify.

api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://tomba.p.rapidapi.com/email-verifier/{email}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "tomba.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: EmailFinder
api_list.description: generates or retrieves the most likely email address from a domain name, a first name and a last name.

required_parameters.name: domain
required_parameters.description: Domain name from which you want to find the email addresses. For example, "stripe.com"

required_parameters.name: first_name
required_parameters.description: The person's first name. It doesn't need to be in lowercase.

required_parameters.name: last_name
required_parameters.description: The person's last name. It doesn't need to be in lowercase.

api_list.name: AuthorFinder
api_list.description: This API endpoint generates or retrieves the most likely email address from a blog post url.

required_parameters.name: url
required_parameters.description: The URL of the article. For example, "https://clearbit.com/blog/company-name-to-domain-api".

api_list.name: EmailCount
api_list.description: Domain name from which you want to find the email addresses.

required_parameters.name: domain
required_parameters.description: The email address you want to find sources.
